thread.title: Samira Wiley and her fiancee look gorgeous in this black-and-white couple’s portrait
thread.title_full: Samira Wiley and her fiancee look gorgeous in this black-and-white couple’s portrait

author: Caitlin Flynn
title: Samira Wiley and her fiancee look gorgeous in this black-and-white couple’s portrait
text:
Samira Wiley and her fiancee look gorgeous in this black-and-white couple’s portrait Get ready for all the feels , because one of our absolute favorite couples is here to remind us that true love is alive and well. But, don’t take our word for it — one look at Samira Wiley and her fiancee’s gorgeous couple’s portrait is guaranteed to make your hearts collectively melt. Wiley and Lauren Morelli met on the set of Orange is the New Black , where Morelli works behind-the-scenes as a writer and producer for the hit Netflix series.
Morelli didn’t realize she was gay until she joined the OINTB team and met Wiley — and, well, the rest is history. Wiley and Morelli announced their engagement in October and, based on the stunning photos they’ve shared thus far, we can’t wait to see the pics from the couple’s wedding shoot. ❤ 
A photo posted by Samira Wiley (@whododatlikedat) on Jan 2, 2017 at 2:22pm PST 
Wiley is well-known for being an amazing LGBT role model and activist , and Morelli’s Mic.com essay about coming out quickly went viral because, well, she’s just as fabulous and inspirational as her fiancee.
LGBT visibility. Don't ever sleep on how utterly essential this is. Thank you, @outmagazine. #meandmylady 
A photo posted by Samira Wiley (@whododatlikedat) on Jan 1, 2017 at 11:56am PST 
We couldn’t be happier for Wiley and Morelli — it’s been a joy to watch their journey as a couple, and we can’t wait to see what the future has in store for them.
